I would highly recommend Financial Perspectives as a provider of choice for your CFP education."

To top it all, the Master Trainer Mr. Ronald Wong is a 'genious' in the field of financial planning education. His commitment and devotion to help the student is really amazing. The Exam Revision Webinar session and also the Live Webinar session just 2 days before the exam was a real ' Confidence booster' and made me clear the exam with ease and confidence. T

Tan Siew Hui / CFP

"Ronald is light-hearted in the way he teaches and he brings laughter to many, despite long evening classes, i.e. 3.5 hours. He always relaxes and reassures all of us 'how to fail?' in a joyous manner, knowing it is going to be a challenging paper encompassing all curriculum of first 5 CFP Modules. His ability to focus on 'key-appearing' areas and summarizes them for us helps tremendously. In fact, i counted on this, more than revising first 3 modules i cleared before 2009. And, i must admit, it is very much 'hopeful' trying to re-study all textbooks page to page. What is also unique to Ronald's is, everyone have many firing rounds to practise Mock Exam Paper, prepared by himself of course, real time, i.e. like role-play, during the class, so that we've gotten a good feel of how to properly and effectively manage our time in the real sitting, as he emphasizes a lot, like a broken record. As a practitioner himself, Ronald shared with us what are the common pitfalls advisers tend to make, addressed field issues encountered by learners at work, as well as kept everyone ahead of recent developments in the industry. "It is not just about passing the exam." he said. I've happily attended all Ronald's class and i am very much thankful for having enjoyed all his 'lectures' =)) Seriously, if you want to do well for Module 6, with the least number of trials, i think, it is better to find out from him how."

L

Lim Cheng Hoo

Financial Perspectives is Singapore's premier financial education provider. Since 1999, we've pioneered excellence in CFP® certification and professional development for financial advisors.
